product_name: Marmot Stretch Light Half-Zip Top - Men's
long_description: Train under stormy skies in the Stretch Light half-zip top from Marmot. It sheds light moisture and wind, guarding your warmth without causing you to overheat. Marmot Stretch Light half-zip top protects core heat with a stretchy windproof and water-resistant soft-shell fabric. Zippered chest pocket works with your media player. Keep your heat in with the drawcord hem and elasticized cuffs. The men's Marmot Stretch Light half-zip top features thumbholes to keep wrists warm and reflective logos to increase visibility.
short_description: Train under stormy skies in the Stretch Light half-zip top from Marmot. It sheds light moisture and wind, guarding your warmth without causing you to overheat.
